miyagiya tharuna kanthawakage sirura sohon walen goda gena eeta athawara kirima, kanthawange yata andum hora ganima, surupi tharuna kanthawan snanaya karana sthanawala sangawi sita wiwidha aswabhawika kriyawala nirathawima sambandhayen kondaya wetha chodana ella wi thibuneya.

onna oya wage hugak jathi kiyanna puluwankama thiyenawa..tikak balannako ee hatima awulak naha neda..?gahawuth berila..guti kawath berila..nikanma gedara aawath berila...onna ada jothishya anawaki kiyana samaharu kiyana widiya..oyalata mathakada mama ara mulinma kiwwa derane wada satahana..ee dawaswala thibunu mach wagayakatath aragena aawa..ara hurathaliyi ee wada satahana karapu jothishyawediya kiyala kiyana kenayi...samawenna mama methana me jothishyawediya kiyana kena kiyala yeduwe hithamathama thamayi..mokada mata ohuta kelinma jothishya wediya kiyala kiyanna puluwanda kiyala matama thama hitha ganna baha..ithin dan menna tharange patan ganna kalin meyala kata gahanawa..kola peralanawa..mal kadanawa..eka keliyayi..anthimata kiyanawa rate hamotama pahanak paththukarala eekata wandagena kiyanna kiyala yathikawak...ehema kalama mulu ratema minissunge prarthanawa shakthiyak wela..eeka jayasuriyage ath dekata labila ee datha shakthimath wela..bole palime hakiyawa labenawa..aaye eeke dekak naha...eeka thama kathawaoya welawata mata kalpana wenawa..waradilawath indiyawe kastiya ehema oowa karanna gaththoth apita kawadawath indiyawata gahala dinanna hamba wenne naha neda kiyala..?apita neweyi danata test gahana eka ratakatawath indiyawata atha thiyanna wenne naha..yanthan kawada hari chine jathyanthara mattamata awith krikat gahawuwoth misak..mokada yako hata kotiyak pahan asse api mona labbak karannada..?anika jothishya kiyanneth apita wada indiyawa idiriyen inna wishayak hinda ee athin unath apita kalin me pahan keliya un dana gena inna epayi...ithin mama me wada satahana ara parama pawithra chethanawen balana eka nawaththala..monawa unath ara keli pawne kiyala eekige mala kolan diha witharak balan inna purudu una...hithatath shanipayine appa..ara undage bahubutha ahala mole koloppan karagannawata wada..ithin ee wage wada satahan adatath oya rupawahini nalikawala yanawa athi..oya mama kiwwa me para loka kusalane awasan tharage gana kiwwa jothishyawediniyath oya kiyanna aththe oya wagema anawakiyak wenna natha..ee gana mama wigraha karanne naha.....................................hari dan wadagathma hariya..kattiya mechchara wela balan inna aththe mama kiyana anawakiya gana neda..?eeta kalin me tikath ahannako...loke hugak jothishakrama ha eewayen wiwidha aakarayata wada ganna jothishya wedinuth innawa...mamath ithin ee atharin ekek witharayi...samaharunta me tharangaya thiyena dawase thibena sulu graha pihitimak gana balala oya anawakiya kiyanna puluwan wenna puluwan..habayi mata ehema baha..samaharu me ratawal walata thiyena kendara satahan walata anuwa eda dawase wadi wasiya thiyena rata thoraganna puluwan..ara ihatha kiwwa anawakiyath ehema ekak wenna athi..eeth mata pakisthane kendarayak hoya ganna bari una..ee witharak neweyi ape oya thiyena lanka kendraya kiyana kumbha lagnayata ayath kendrayath matanan awulak..eeka witharak neweyi janaraja kendraya kiyala ekakuth thiyenawa..ooka gana bellana gnyanawimala nayaka hamuduruwoth eka parak sahena wigrahayak karala thibuna mata mathakayi..ee kiyanne kendara dekak thiye..ekak ratata nidahasa labuna welawe..eka anika janaraja dinayata adalawa hadapu kendraya..matanan oya dekama gana kiyanna baha mokada oya dawas dekema neweyine lankawa ipadune..ithin hari haman kendarayak nathiwa mama kohomada ooka kiyanne..hari ee lagata thawa widiyak thiye..ee thama kandayame kridakayinge janma kendara tika...wadiya naha 22yi ne thiyenne..ape 11yi ada tharage dinana ayage 11yi..ee unata e tika hoyagannawath widiyak nahane..ithin mokada karanne...oya widiyata balapuwama mata kiyanna thiyenne matanan ooka kiyanna hatiyak naha kiyala thamayi...aduma gane nayakayin dedenage hari puhunu karuwan dedenagewath thibbanan ehemanan tikak hari uthsaha karanna thibuna..ithin dan mokada karanne..?me wenakotath ara pol kiyana buwalla miya gihin..maaranna kalin indalama ee ahinsaka sathawa maranna hugak aya lasthi una..eeye pereda dawasaka indiyawa paradinawayi kiwwa girawekwa awasan gaman yawala kiyalath mama prawruththiyak dakka..ehema thathwayak yatathe mamath mokatada illan kanne..anika ithin oowa jothishyayatama hariyata kiyanna puluwannan mach gahanna kale nasthi karanna onath naha..kelinma ratawal deke hondama jothishyawedin dennek genawa..wade thiranaya kala kusalane dunna ..gema finish...awasana washayen kiyanna thiyenne mamath jothishyaya bhawitha karana..eyata hugak garu karana..wishwasa karana kenek..eeth jothishyaye athi sima ha ape danumehi athi simawan api anduragena katayuthu karanna oona..ee hinda mama kiyanne mechcharayi..ane mamanan danne naha oya loka kusalane kawuru ganida kiyala...eeka danna kenek innawanan..eeka mata kiyannath epa..mokada mata edata mach eka hondata balala eeka windinna oona..kalin prathipale danagaththoth mata ooka baladdi melo rahak nathi weyi...onna kiwwa...ala bahinakal hitiya mata ooka thambenakal inna barida..?*pasu satahana...bandakka...bandakka...labayi..labayi...gannawada..?
